_sText: bhop\_strafe\_sepulchre\_hard ================== Just a little modification of my [bhop\_strafe\_sepulchre](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/176014 "link1"), this time with **once bhop**. Some wanted a harder version so I made this, much harder, every level is challenging. This map is not made for speed runs anymore. Play it to improve your strafing skills. **This is a _strafe map, it forces sv\_enablebunnyhopping 0, limiting the amount of speed you can get from jumps. You cannot rely on good jumps to finish this map, so you must use proper strafing.** Have fun while strafing, keyuu PS: nyastle xoxo ![pic1](http://puu.sh/58T9P.png "haha")
